about_the_game:
Join Arishia, an 11-year-old girl with a brave spirit, on an epic adventure through a world of fantasy and mystery in our exciting action and exploration game!

On a peaceful night, Arishia is startled awake by a mysterious noise in her room. Peering out the window, she discovers a mischievous cat stealing her school clothes. This unexpected encounter is just the beginning of an incredible journey that will lead Arishia to uncover the hidden secrets of the forest.

With captivating anime-style art that brings the game world to life, accompany Arishia on her quest to retrieve her clothes and discover a world full of surprises and challenges. As Arishia ventures deeper into the forest, she faces formidable enemies and uncovers the truth behind the mysteries that shroud this place.

Get ready for an unforgettable experience in our new action and exploration game, where every twist of the story will keep you on edge and leave you eager to discover what fate has in store for Arishia.

Key Features:

Explore a world of fantasy filled with mysteries and wonders waiting to be discovered.
Enjoy captivating anime-style art that brings the game world to life.
Accompany Arishia on her journey full of action, intrigue, and magic.
Immerse yourself in a captivating story of friendship, courage, and redemption.
Get ready for an unforgettable experience in our new action and exploration game!

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Procesador Intel® Core™ i3-8100
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 1660 o AMD rx570

short_description: Immerse yourself in an exciting anime-style metroidvania, where each skill unlocks new areas and secrets on the vast map. Face powerful bosses, acquire unique abilities, and uncover hidden mysteries in this ever-evolving world, all with traditional anime-inspired animation.
